programme.title: ONE Fight Night 33: Rodrigues Vs. Persson
programme.desc: Get ready for highlight-reel moments and star-making performances, as the world’s most exciting martial artists heat up the summer with ONE Fight Night 33: Rodrigues vs. Persson. In the main event, two of the most talented strikers on the planet throw down for the ONE Women’s Atomweight Muay Thai World Title. For nearly five years, Allycia Hellen Rodrigues has eradicated every challenger who’s attempted to steal the crown. But now, the Brazilian mom-champ defends her gold against WBC Muay Thai World Champion Johanna Persson, who is determined to dethrone the titleholder in her promotional debut. Also, in a featured attraction, #3-ranked featherweight Muay Thai contender Shadow Singha Mawynn makes his U.S. primetime debut and attempts to inch closer to a World Title shot. programme.title: Passed by Censor
programme.desc: In an Istanbul prison, Zakir is tasked with reading and censoring the letters inmates receive. Tasked with a writing assignment for his night class, Zakir uses a photograph of an inmate's wife for inspiration, but fantasy soon morphs into delusion.

programme.title: Oddball
programme.desc: An eccentric chicken farmer, with the help of his granddaughter, trains his mischievous dog Oddball to protect a penguin sanctuary from fox attacks in an attempt to reunite his family and save their seaside town.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Decisions In Athens
programme.desc: Inspector Mehmet goes on an unofficial assignment abroad to help his ex-wife Sevim to track down her missing partner Steffen, an investigative journalist, and his kidnapped daughter Clara in the Greek capital Athens.

programme.title: Run To You
programme.desc: Gianni is a serial seducer, but his life is destined to change when he meets Chiara, a beautiful woman who has had an accident and is paraplegic.

programme.title: What's for Dinner, Mom?
programme.desc: Sisters Tae and Yo return to their childhood home and discover a box of recipes and letters from their late Japanese mother. As Tae uncovers her mother’s hidden struggles, she journeys to Taiwan to retrace her past through memory and food.

programme.title: Hard Luck
programme.desc: A family comes to the funeral of their beloved grandfather. After the burial it turns out that the numbers grandfather always bet at the lottery just won big, but the winning ticket was buried with him. The race for the buried ticket begins.

programme.title: Murders on the Frioul Islands
programme.desc: When a renowned editor is found dead on stage during a play, young Captain Victor Mariani is put in charge of the case. But tensions rise and secrets surface when his father Pierre, a retired commissioner and old friend of the victim, joins the case.

programme.title: Clean Sweep 1: Done Is Done
programme.desc: Shelly Mohan, a housewife and mother of three, makes an irreparable decision and commits a horrific act when Charlie Lynch, a man from her troubled past, contacts her.

programme.title: Clean Sweep 2: Post Mortem
programme.desc: Shelly's husband Jason, a Garda Detective, is delighted to be assigned to the case, with no sense where the trail may lead. While he and his co-worker, Fiona, focus on a sex worker, Shelly realizes she may have left evidence in the dead man's hotel room.

programme.title: The Golden Dream
programme.desc: Juan, Sara and Samuel, all 15 years old, flee from Guatemala towards the USA. programme.title: My Daughter On The Run
programme.desc: When the police deem her daughter’s runaway case as not a priority, Jeanne has to look for her daughter by herself. Jeanne begins a journey into hell, as she learns that her daughter has become a stranger to her.

programme.title: A Little Lesson In Love
programme.desc: Taking shelter from a storm inside a cafe, Julie finds a stack of math papers left behind and a troubling love letter. It seems that a teenager had written it for her teacher, and it is up to Julie to prevent the student from doing anything stupid.

programme.title: The Vanishing Soldier
programme.desc: An 18-year-old Israeli soldier flees the Gaza battlefield and heads back to his girlfriend in Tel Aviv only to discover that the military elite is convinced he was kidnapped in the fog of war.

programme.desc: Insurance claims investigator Claudio finds himself in a never-ending nightmare in a small town. For what seemed like a simple job, Claudio's task now involves racing against the clock to discover the identity of the worst serial arsonist he has yet seen.

programme.title: Run To You
programme.desc: Gianni is a serial seducer, but his life is destined to change when he meets Chiara, a beautiful woman who has had an accident and is paraplegic.

programme.title: Clean Sweep 1: Done Is Done
programme.desc: Shelly Mohan, a housewife and mother of three, makes an irreparable decision and commits a horrific act when Charlie Lynch, a man from her troubled past, contacts her.

programme.title: Clean Sweep 2: Post Mortem
programme.desc: Shelly's husband Jason, a Garda Detective, is delighted to be assigned to the case, with no sense where the trail may lead. While he and his co-worker, Fiona, focus on a sex worker, Shelly realizes she may have left evidence in the dead man's hotel room.

programme.title: Hard Luck
programme.desc: A family comes to the funeral of their beloved grandfather. After the burial it turns out that the numbers grandfather always bet at the lottery just won big, but the winning ticket was buried with him. The race for the buried ticket begins.

programme.title: A Little Lesson In Love
programme.desc: Taking shelter from a storm inside a cafe, Julie finds a stack of math papers left behind and a troubling love letter. It seems that a teenager had written it for her teacher, and it is up to Julie to prevent the student from doing anything stupid.

programme.title: Our Children
programme.desc: A doctor brings a boy to Belgium and raises him as his own. When the boy reaches manhood, he gets married and starts his own family, but he still relies on the doctor, his adoptive father. When trouble strikes his family, dependence turns into domination.

programme.title: My Daughter On The Run
programme.desc: When the police deem her daughter’s runaway case as not a priority, Jeanne has to look for her daughter by herself. Jeanne begins a journey into hell, as she learns that her daughter has become a stranger to her.

programme.title: Man And A Baby
programme.desc: Dad (Antti) is left alone with a newborn after the mom (Pia) decides motherhood is not her thing. Single dad tries to survive alone in "women's world" and keep the baby and himself alive.

programme.title: The Broken Glass Theory
programme.desc: Insurance claims investigator Claudio finds himself in a never-ending nightmare in a small town. For what seemed like a simple job, Claudio's task now involves racing against the clock to discover the identity of the worst serial arsonist he has yet seen.

programme.title: Clean Sweep 3: Find Her
programme.desc: As Shelly attempts to maintain her routine, she is haunted by her past. When Lynch's true identity is discovered, a UK cold case officer re-opens a case which she is convinced involves Lynch and his then girlfriend.

programme.title: Clean Sweep 4: Deirdre
programme.desc: Shelly's attempts to bond with Derek are not a success. Meanwhile, following the lead of the hotel sex-worker, Jason and Fiona discover victims of a brutal trafficking organisation.

programme.title: The Vanishing Soldier
programme.desc: An 18-year-old Israeli soldier flees the Gaza battlefield and heads back to his girlfriend in Tel Aviv only to discover that the military elite is convinced he was kidnapped in the fog of war.

programme.title: Hunters On A White Field
programme.desc: Deep in the Swedish woods, three friends go on an extended weekend hunting trip. After an initial spell of success, the animals suddenly vanish without a trace. Despite being in a forest without animals, the men decide that the hunt must continue.

programme.title: 3 Meters Above The Sky
programme.desc: An upper middle class good girl falls for a bad boy on the wrong side of the tracks. It is a first love that is at once passionate and tempestuous. Released in Spain in 2010, it was a major box office hit.

programme.title: The Pursuit
programme.desc: When a young man decides to climb a staircase in the middle of an enchanted forest, he is confronted with unanticipated chaos. Stuck on a seemingly never-ending journey, will he ever make it out of the woods?

programme.title: The Beast In The Woods
programme.desc: As part of his tribe’s rite of passage, a young hunter has to prove his worth by hunting down a great beast. However, amidst navigating the hunt and the rituals of his tribe, he finds himself increasingly troubled by what he has done.

programme.title: The Exception
programme.desc: Four women working at an NGO investigating war crimes are shaken when two of them receive death threats. While they Initially blame a Serbian war criminal, their suspicions turn on each other when a case of bullying in the office escalates.

programme.title: Mercenary
programme.desc: Soane, a young Caledonian, leaves home to try his luck in France as a rugby player. Left on his own in a foreign land, Soane’s odyssey will take him on the path to becoming a man in a world where there is a price to be paid for success.
